articles.content: New Delhi: Director Sanjay Leela Bhansalis biographical drama Gangubai Kathiawadi has run into trouble with both the director and lead actor Alia Bhatt being summoned by court on 21 May in a criminal… [+1900 chars]

articles.author: Sana Farzeen
articles.title: Neetu Kapoor breaks down as she remembers Rishi Kapoor, shares how they fell in love - The Indian Express
articles.description: Neetu Kapoor was also left emotional and overwhelmed when Rishi Kapoor's friends Rakesh Roshan, Jeetendra and Prem Chopra's video message was played out on the Indian Idol 12 stage.

articles.title: R Madhavan tests positive for COVID-19 after Aamir Khan, writes: ‘Farhan has to follow Rancho’ - The Indian Express
articles.description: R Madhavan shared his COVID-19 diagnosis on social media while invoking the film 3 Idiots. His co-star from the film, Aamir Khan, tested positive for the virus on Wednesday.
articles.content:
Actor R Madhavan has tested positive for COVID-19. The actor took to social media to inform his followers about his coronavirus-positive, while mentioning the film 3 Idiots.

articles.author: Kriti Sonali
articles.title: Arjun-Malaika attend a cosy get-together with Karan Johar, Gauri Khan as Kareena is ‘waiting for the weekend’. See inside pics - The Indian Express
articles.description: It was party time as Karan Johar, Karisma Kapoor, Gauri Khan and Maheep Kapoor came together for some 'catching up'. However, it was Malaika Arora and Arjun Kapoor's presence that got all the eyeballs.
articles.content: The weekend seems to have come early this time. On Wednesday night, Bollywood besties Karan Johar, Malaika Arora, sister Amrita Arora, Karisma Kapoor, Gauri Khan, Maheep Kapoor, Natasha Poonawalla, S… [+1313 chars]
